com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Interface IYRCComposite

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IYRCPaginatedSearchAndListComposite, IYRCSearchAndListComposite
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    YRCAboutPanel, YRCAlertAddCommentsPanel, YRCAlertDetailsPage, YRCAlertDetailsWizard, YRCAlertExceptionDetails, YRCAlertGetNewPriorityPanel, YRCAlertMessage, YRCAlertSearchWizard, YRCAlertSearchWizardPage, YRCAssignAlertToQueue, YRCAssignAlertToUser, YRCCallCenterCustomerMessage, YRCCallCenterHeader, YRCContainerRelatedTasks, YRCFilterPanel, YRCFindQueue, YRCFindUser, YRCGenericWizard, YRCMenuPanel, YRCSCVHeader, YRCStoreCustomerMessage, YRCStoreFooter, YRCStoreHeader, YRCStoreRelatedTasks, YRCSupplierSearchandList, YRCWizard

    public interface IYRCComposite
    Interface to be implemented for creating new composite screens and forms.

    Provides some basic idenifiers common to all forms used by an application.
    Author:
    Pramod Varma

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFormId()
      Returns the form id of the form.
      java.lang.String getHelpId()

      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getRootPanel()

    • Method Detail

      • getFormId

        java.lang.String getFormId()
        Returns the form id of the form.
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of a form. It should be a unique id across the application. Note:

        The statndard is to give the fully qualified classpath of the class file. For example, "<Package>.<Class_Name>"

        Form id is used for various purposes. They are:
        • As a unique identifier for the form.
        • In extensibility for adding extended controls.
        • For setting contexts for forms. Setting context enables the key bindings specified for the form.
        • Storing api output templates on the application server.

      • getRootPanel

        org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getRootPanel()
        Method to get the rootmost panel used in the form.
        Returns:
        The root most panel used in the form.

      • getPanelHolder

        IYRCPanelHolder getPanelHolder()
        Returns:
        The panel holder for the form. It is the editor in which the current form is being displayed.

        Note: null can be returned as a valid argument.

      • getHelpId

        java.lang.String getHelpId()
        Method to get the help id for the form. The help id is used to get the online help related to the current form.
        Returns:
        The help id for the form.
